title: Kanojo ga Cafe ni Kayou Wake
original_name: 彼女がカフェに通う理由
sinopse: Haruyo doesn't believe she will ever fall in love - Not when she's way too tall and looks so boylish that she attracts more girls than guys. One day, by a stroke of (mis)fortune, she finds herself employed at Hot Cafe, a place famous for their cute waiters and waitress. There's just one little problem... How is she going to catch the eye of Kono, when the boss insists she dresses up as a waiters?! Sit back, and let our waiters serve up a delightful platter of romantic interludes! Welcome to Hot Cafe!
